name: tinywords
description: TinyWords project scaffold from SSOT docs

scripts.build: mkdir -p web/i18n web/lib && cp src/i18n/locales/*.json web/i18n/ && cp node_modules/lottie-web/build/player/lottie_light.min.js web/lib/ && node scripts/generate-config.mjs
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy web
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run android
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios
